QuestData.Title: Reforging the Key
QuestData.Description: Delays, delays... the one thing we cannot afford right now!$b$bAs much as I hate to disturb Lord Surristrasz, he's our only hope of saving our beloved Evanor.$b$bBring him the key fragments and hope that his mood is favorable.$b$bHurry, $c, our assault team is waiting.
QuestData.LogDescription: Donathan wants you to speak to Surristrasz on Amber Ledge.
QuestData.CompletionText: You dare approach me, mortal?$b$bFor the sake of your unborn children, pray that your cause is worthwhile.
QuestData.RewardText: The frivolous games you play here are of no consequence....$b$bYou and your Dalaran allies pick at loose threads while the fabric of this world's future is being shredded.$b$bStill, this may provide my drakes some needed amusement.$b$bShow me this key....
